body_content.explanation: to go across from one side of something to the other for a second, third, etc. time:
examples: They had to cross and re-cross a stream to get there.
The new program will not deter desperate refugees from attempting to recross the border.

body_content.explanation: to change your leg or arm position so that a different leg or arm is on the top from the one that was on top previously:
examples: We often cross and recross our legs to change sitting position.
